name: Don't Fall (itch) (edmarc)
description:
It's a monday. Which means, work day. Which also means, wake up early. Which also ALSO means, don't be late.

But of course, you're gonna wait until 6:59AM TO WAKE UP AND GET READY. ARE YOU KIDDING ME. THIS IS WHY YOU'RE ABOUT TO GET FIRED.

(Made for One Minute Game Jam #9.)
